'''"Kusava"''' is a [[Gadget]] obtained during the [[Agnihotra Sutra]] [[World Quests]] Series.

The ability changes with every quest:
* ''[[Starry Night Chapter]]'': [[Aranakin]]
* ''[[Risen Moon Chapter]]'': [[Aragaru]]
* ''[[The Final Chapter]]'': [[Aranaga]]

After the Arahaoma Ritual, the gadget changes to have all three abilities at once.

Completion of ''[[The Final Chapter]]'' will result in the loss of this gadget as it becomes the [[Withered Kusava]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Kusava may be derived from two Sanskrit words ''Kusa'' and ''Va. Kusa'' refers to a sacred grass used in Hindu ceremonies and ''Va'' means Varuṇa -the god of rain and water(Agni Purāṇa, Chapter 348). ''[https://www.wisdomlib.org/definition/va#:~:text=Va%20or%20V%C4%81.%E2%80%94%20%28IE%208-1%29%2C%20abbreviation%20of%20Prakrit,commonly%20written%20in%20Sanskrit%2C%20Prakrit%20or%20Dravidian%20languages. Va]'' may have more meanings in Sanskrit.
